functions.tag: {skill:{trigger:'hold_sneak',id:5s,sid:'boots_de_terra'},raw_json:{content:'["",{"text":"ຆ","font":"island"}," ",{"score":{"name": "@s","objective": "terra.c.skill"},"color":"yellow"}]',Slot:['boots']},Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:6,AttributeModifiers:[{Name:'LeatherBootGround',Amount:2.0d,Operation:0,AttributeName:'generic.armor',Slot:'feet',UUID:[I;792867,-11111111,127318725,-98]}],display:{Name:'{"text": "大地之靴","color": "dark_purple","italic": false}',Lore:['"史诗"','""','{"text": "“只要脚触大地，力量就不会断绝”","color": "green","italic": false}','""','{"text": "基础属性：","color": "dark_green","italic": false}','{"text": "+2 护甲","color": "dark_green","italic": false}','{"text": "无法损坏","color": "blue"}','""','{"text": "技能：绝闩","italic": false,"color": "#b5362d","bold": true}','[{"text": "长按","color": "white","bold": true,"italic": false},{"keybind":"key.sneak"},"三秒后松开触发"]','"双手横伸如天平，两脚触地如直木"','{"text": "将承受的所有物理攻击通过身躯传导到脚下的土地里","italic": false,"color": "yellow"}','{"text": "使得自己免疫绝大部分的物理伤害。","italic": false,"color": "yellow"}','{"text": "但但每次承担伤害都会使你的脚越陷越深","italic": false,"color": "yellow"}','{"text": "技能持续时间内受到物理伤害将减缓你的移度","color": "red","italic": false}','{"text": "限制：若你的移动速度降为0，技能提前结束","color": "red","italic": false}','{"text": "技能持续30秒","color": "green","italic": false}','{"text": "冷却：6分钟","color": "yellow"}']}}
